meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Review this page to see all required disclosures of the Utah Connections Academy (UCA) educational program.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

div.p: As a public charter school, Utah Connections Academy is committed to meeting the State of Utah's rigorous standards. Listed below are documents that support our commitment for academic achievement and accountability.

li.a: Utah Fiscal Controls, Disbursement and Procurement Policies

div.p: For questions or concerns related to UCA's Student Data Privacy Policies, please contact Sarah McCarrey, Data Manager/Information Security Officer smccarrey@uca.connectionsacademy.org.
